item.title: Pacific Drive ‘Endless Expeditions’ update launches April 3
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/pacific-drive-endless-expeditions-update-launches-april-3

  • PC
  • PS5

New maps, spawning systems, improved tools, and more.

The fourth free content update for Pacific Drive, dubbed “Endless Expeditions,” will launch on April 3, publisher Kepler Interactive and developer Ironwood Studios announced. It will introduce new maps, spawning systems, improved tools, and more.

Get the details below.

Hit the wide open Zone in the largest update to Pacific Drive yet!

Set off from the garage on new continuous drives—Expeditions. Dangerous and filled with their own unique rewards, these challenging trips will test even the most seasoned breacher. New maps, spawning systems, improved tools and so much more is coming April 3rd, 2025.

We’ve also created a new Suspend Run feature, something that’s been requested heavily by the community! Suspend and quit while on a trip mid-junction and return any time without losing any progress.

There’s also new cosmetic rewards for your garage, over an hour of new music on the radio, and even more lore to discover through the fax machine, Truly, this is our biggest and best update yet.

Pacific Drive is available now for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.
